author: IGN
description:
Gigasword is available now on PC (Steam, GOG, and Epic Games Store), Xbox, PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), and Nintendo Switch. Watch the Gigasword launch trailer for this action adventure game. Balance the weight of the GIGASWORD, battling between brain and brawn. Solve intricate puzzles, discover covert chambers, and slash through foes as Ezra fights to reach the top of the Nestrium and recover the God Crystal within. Can he restore the world's coherency before it's too late?

#IGN #gaming
title: Gigasword - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Valve's Steam Machine announcement sent ripples through the gaming industry this week, and Head of Xbox, Phil Spencer, has weighed in. Spencer congratulated Valve and said in a tweet that Microsoft is one of Steam's biggest game publishers, and they welcome the new addition to gaming hardware. Valve also announced a new controller and the Steam Frame, a new VR headset. In other news, Sony and NCSoft have announced Horizon Steel Frontier, an MMO for mobile devices set in Sony's Horizon franchise. And finally, Apple has revealed the first real trailer for season 2 of Monarch: Legacy of Monsters, the show set in the Godzilla x Kong universe.
title: Xbox's Phil Spencer Welcomes Valve's Steam Machine - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Darkmoor Launch Trailer for Wizard101, the free-to-play magic-based MMO RPG developed by KingIsle Entertainment. Players will be able to explore an eerie and shadow-filled realm known as Darkmoor to experience a new area and the start of a multi-year story arc. Harness new spells and gain access to quality-of-life updates with the Darkmoor Expansion, available now in Wizard101 for PC, with a release on console at a later date.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Wizard101 - Official Darkmoor Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Console and Mobile Release Date Trailer for Red Dead Redemption, the critically acclaimed Western action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games. Embark on the tale of John Marston as his old ties to the Van der Linde Gang come back to haunt him years after the events of Red Dead Redemption 2. Players can access new upgrades, the ability to carry over game progress, and a number of enhancements at no extra charge. Red Dead Redemption is launching on December 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, iOS, Android, and Netflix Games.

#IGN #RedDeadRedemption #Gaming
title: Red Dead Redemption - Official Console and Mobile Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Wuthering Heights trailer for the upcoming film imagining of one of the greatest love stories of all time. Wuthering Heights stars Margot Robbie as Cathy and Jacob Elordi as Heathcliff, whose forbidden passion for one another turns from romantic to intoxicating in an epic tale of lust, love and madness. The film also stars Hong Chau, Shazad Latif, Alison Oliver, Martin Clunes and Ewan Mitchell. 

Emerald Fennell directs from her own screenplay based on the novel Wuthering Heights by Emily Brontë, and produces alongside Oscar nominee and BAFTA award winner Josey McNamara and Robbie. Oscar nominee Tom Ackerley and Sara Desmond are executive producing.

Wuthering Heights opens in theaters on February 13, 2026, and internationally beginning 11 February.
title: Wuthering Heights - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Margot Robbie, Jacob Elordi

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Early Access Launch Trailer for Assetto Corsa Rally, a rally racing simulation game developed by Supernova Games Studios. Players will get behind the wheel of high-performance vehicles to race on laser-scanned roads for realism across a suite of different modes from Rally School, Career mode, and more. Assetto Corsa Rally is available now in Early Access for PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Assetto Corsa Rally - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Vampire Survivors is coming to VR! Watch the Vampire Survivors: But It's In Virtual Reality announcement trailer for this time survival roguelite game to see chaotic gameplay and more. Vampire Survivors VR is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements, except now, it's in Virtual Reality! The supernatural indie phenomenon that lets you be the bullet hell, on your face! Vampire Survivors VR is available now on Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S.

#IGN #gaming
title: Vampire Survivors: But It's In Virtual Reality - Official Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase Fall 25

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Dvergar Drill Exotic Weapon Trailer for Destiny: Rising, the hit mobile third-person action RPG shooter developed by NetEase Games. 

Take up arms against waves of enemies with the Dvergar Drill Light Grenade Launcher, offering high-velocity projectiles that drill targets upon impact. Make use of the Dvergar Drill Exotic Weapon in Destiny: Rising, available now for iOS and Android.

#IGN #DestinyRising #ActionRPG
title: Destiny: Rising - Official Dvergar Drill Exotic Weapon Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Apex Legends trailer for the free-to-play battle royale game to see gameplay and what you can expect from the Supersonic Event. Break the sound barrier in the Supersonic Event! Wildcard goes into overdrive: Olympus drops into Wildcard, a new missile-launching Mythic R-99 hits the field, and speed-boosting Wild Cards help you outrun and outplay your opponents. 

Apex Legends is available now on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC via EA App, Epic Games Store and Steam. The Supersonic Event for Apex Legends begins November 18, 2025.

#IGN #ApexLegends #SupersonicEvent
title: Apex Legends - Official Supersonic Event Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Ghost of Yotei trailer for the action-adventure game to see the PS5 Pro features, including PlayStation Spectral Super Resolution (PSSR) and ray-traced global illumination at 60FPS. 

Ghost of Yotei is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GhostOfYotei #ActionAdventure
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official PS5 Pro Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Equilibrium Dungeon Trailer for Destiny 2, the hit action first-person MMO RPG developed by Bungie. Guardians will soon be able to take a shot at the upcoming dungeon with the Equilibrium Dungeon, requiring coordination, skill, and strategy to overcome with a Fireteam. The Equilibrium Dungeon launches into Destiny 2 on December 13.

#IGN #Destiny2 #StarWars
title: Destiny 2 - Official Equilibrium Dungeon Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We break down the new Horizon Steel Frontiers trailer to see how Korean developer NCSoft is re-thinking the fundamentals of Horizon for multiplayer. From Steel Frontiers' new take on combat, to both new and familiar robotic foes, character creation, and more! We've combed through the latest trailer to break down and discuss the biggest changes coming to this multiplayer switch-up.

#IGN #HorizonSteelFrontiers #MMORPG
title: Horizon MMORPG Trailer Explained - Everything We Spotted in Horizon Steel Frontiers

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Fallout Season 2 trailer for the series based on the iconic video game. Fallout Season 2 stars Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Walton Goggins, Kyle MacLachlan, Moisés Arias, and Frances Turner. Season 2 of Fallout arrives on Prime Video on December 17, 2025.

The new season will pick up in the aftermath of Season One’s epic finale and take audiences along for a journey through the wasteland of the Mojave to the post-apocalyptic city of New Vegas.

Fallout is the story of haves and have-nots in a world in which there’s almost nothing left to have. 200 years after the apocalypse, the gentle denizens of luxury fallout shelters are forced to return to the incredibly complex, gleefully weird and highly violent universe waiting for them above.

Fallout is produced by Kilter Films, with executive producers Jonathan Nolan, Lisa Joy and Athena Wickham. Geneva Robertson-Dworet and Graham Wagner serve as executive producers, creators, and showrunners. Todd Howard, Bethesda Game Studios,
title: Fallout: Season 2 - Official Trailer (2025) Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Walton Goggins

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Deep Dive Overview Part 2 for The Blood of Dawnwalker, an open-world dark fantasy action-adventure RPG developed by Rebel Wolves. Players can witness the continuation of the gameplay sequence from June 2025, as players embody Coen, a mortal man by day and a vampire by night. Get an in-depth and extensive look at the dialogue options, world exploration, and brutal combat, alongside the differences in gameplay when nightfalls and the vampire within seeps to the surface. The Blood of Dawnwalker is coming in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#TheBloodofDawnWalker #IGN #Gaming
title: The Blood of Dawnwalker - Official Gameplay Deep Dive Overview Part 2

author: IGN
description:
Check out the full episode here! - https://youtu.be/KRNXRzPyf5E?si=BIte6Pe7nARrsYwh

Since Insomniac’s Spider-Man, the quality of games based on Marvel properties has steadily been improving. Marvel Rivals has won over the Overwatch crowd, and Marvel Tokon Fighting Souls looks to get some love from the MvC crowd. Cosmic Invasion and Deadpool VR are dropping next month and 2026 is shaping up to be big with Marvel 1943: The Rise of Hydra and Insomniac’s Wolverine. Plus, there’s still Arkane Lyon’s Blade game in the works. We’ve certainly come a long way from the licensed cash-grabs that make up so much of the earlier games based on these beloved characters, which is very nice to see. Beyond!

This weeks show is hosted by Max Scoville, Nick Limon, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#MarvelTokon #MarvelsWolverine #MarvelGames
title: Marvel Video Games Are The Best They've Ever Been - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Check out the G-Star 2025 Trailer for Solo Leveling: Karma, an action RPG roguelite developed by Netmarble. 

Players will fight through an original storyline set in the Dimensional Gap, a 27-year-long war among Monarchs and the protagonist Sung Jinwoo. Make use of a suite of weapons against countless enemies in Solo Leveling: Karma, coming soon to iOS, Android, and PC.

#IGN #SoloLevelingKarma #ActionRPG
title: Solo Leveling: Karma - Official G-Star 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Yakuza Kiwami & Kiwami 2, the pair of games that started the action-adventure series developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio. 

Players will experience the classic titles in a modern presentation with features suited for the hardware, as the story of former yakuza Kazuma Kiryu unfolds in the pursuit of unwinding a 10-billion-yen conspiracy in Tokyo’s red-light district. Let fists fly in Yakuza Kiwami & Kiwami 2, available now for Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #YakuzaKiwami #LikeADragon
title: Yakuza Kiwami & Kiwami 2 - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 20 minutes of exclusive gameplay from the upcoming Act 3 of Winter Survival, the story-driven first-person survival game that challenges you to survive brutal weather conditions in a frontier wilderness. The full 1.0 release will be available on PC (via Steam and the Epic Games Store) on November 19. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1394960/Winter_Survival/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Winter Survival: Exclusive Act 3 Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Nintendo has graced the Pokemon fandom with a deep and extended look at Pokemon Pokopia, an upcoming life simulation and management game within the world of Pokemon developed by Koei Tecmo, Omega Force, and The Pokemon Company. See what the moment-to-moment gameplay has to offer, with the game being focused on living and co-existing with Pokemon as opposed to allowing them to duke it out in Pokemon Gyms like in the traditional games. 

Explore the vibrant open world and create habitats for more Pokemon to enter the world, learn new moves from Pokemon to fly, set sail on the open seas, and water plants to grow vegetation. Progress through the game to get new clothing options and furniture to customize your living space in Pokemon Pokopia, launching on March 5 for Nintendo Switch 2.

#PokemonPokopia #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon Pokopia Gets An Extended Gameplay Trailer, What Do You Think?

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Where Winds Meet live action trailer for this upcoming open-world action RPG featuring martial artist and consultant on martial arts movies, Song Shuxin, showcasing the Rope Dart weapon in action. Where Winds Meet features seven weapon types and dozens of martial arts moves. In this world of Jianghu, the wanderer sets the rules. Where Winds Meet will be available on PC and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on November 14, 2025.

In the world of martial arts, the sword and blade are not always the ultimate rulers. The Rope Dart, hailed as the king of flexible weapons, excels at conquering strength with grace.

The wanderer relies on skill and charisma to mediate conflicts, maintaining peace and order in the martial realm.

#IGN #WhereWindsMeet #LiveAction
title: Where Winds Meet - Official Live Action Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants trailer for this upcoming animated film starring Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown, Rodger Bumpass, Bill Fagerbakke, Carolyn Lawrence, Mr. Lawrence, George Lopez, Isis “Ice Spice” Gaston, Arturo Castro, Sherry Cola with Regina Hall and Mark Hamill.

SpongeBob and his Bikini Bottom friends set sail in their biggest, all-new, can’t miss cinematic event ever…The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants. Desperate to be a big guy, SpongeBob sets out to prove his bravery to Mr. Krabs by following The Flying Dutchman – a mysterious swashbuckling ghost pirate – on a seafaring comedy-adventure that takes him to the deepest depths of the deep sea, where no Sponge has gone before.

The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants is executive produced by Marc Ceccarelli, Vincent Waller, Pete Chiappetta, Anthony Tittanegro, and Andrew Lary. It is produced by Lisa Stewart, p.g.a., Pam Brady, Aaron Dem. Based on the Series “SpongeBob SquarePants” Created by Stephe
title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants - Official Trailer (2025) Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! It's a big week for hardware news, as Valve has announced their new hardware initiative, led by the revamped Steam Machine, a new Steam controller, and a new VR headset, the Steam Frame. IGN's hardware and tech editors Michael Higham and Jackie Thomas join us this week to talk about their hands-on time with the new hardware. What does this mean for PC gaming, now that Valve is making another push to get PC games in your living room? And what does this mean for console gaming, with both Xbox and PlayStation not even requiring a dedicated console to play games anymore? Plus we have a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com. 

00:00:11 Valve reveals new Steam Machine
00:08:06 What do we think it'll cost?
00:12:48 Valve's new VR headset
00:17:19 Who is this new hardware for?
00:22:16 This week's poll and outro

#IGN
title: Valve Just Entered the Console Wars - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Working with a beloved director like Edgar Wright, adapting a novel by the singular Stephen King, and turning in one of his first pure action hero performances, Glen Powell knows the world is watching to see what he'll do next... and he wants to keep you guessing. Powell sits down with IGN to explain how he relates to Ben Richards, why he chose to star in The Running Man at this point in his career, his first experience with Wright's films through Shaun of the Dead, and what he learned from acting opposite Josh Brolin in the movie.

The Running Man hits theaters November 14th.

#IGN
title: "I Don't Want People To Get Tired of Watching Me" | Why Glen Powell Chose To Star in The Running Man

author: IGN
description: After completing the campaign, you can play the new mode in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Endgame. Endgame is a PvE extraction mode that sees you drop in, complete missions, and attempt to escape with your rewards intact.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Solo Endgame Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Dead Ops Arcade is back — and for the first time ever, you can play in first-person! Dive into endless zombie chaos, ridiculous firepower, and secret rooms in pure chicken-chaos mayhem.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Dead Ops Arcade 4 First-Person Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Check out the opening moments of the newBlack Ops 7 Zombies map, Ashes of the Damned. This gameplay was captured on PC in 1440p and recorded before the main Easter egg went live. Watch as we unlock the Pack-a-Punch and fight off waves of the undead.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Zombies - 15 Minutes of Ashes of the Damned Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Our first look at the sequel to The Super Mario Bros. Movie is here! So, we’ve cast our beady eyes over the new Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer to find all of the characters, secrets, and details we could spot. 

Nintendo and Illumination’s sequel is out on April 3, 2026, so there’s not long to wait. In the meantime, let us know what you’ve spotted in the trailer that we might have missed, as well as some of your best theories on where the film might take us. But first up, here is everything we spotted in The Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer!

#IGN #SuperMarioGalaxyMovie #Mario
title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Trailer: All of the Hidden Secrets and Details

author: IGN
description:
Check out gameplay from Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 new co-op campaign. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 takes the black ops saga back to the future with Alex Mason and his ongoing fight against Raul Menendez. You can do this with or without friends in BLOPS new Co-Op campaign mode. 

Gameplay captured on PC using a GTX 4090

#IGN #CallOfDutyBlackOps7 #CoOpCampaign
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - 18 Minutes of Solo Campaign Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
If you’ve finished the campaign in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and think the story’s over, think again. Endgame is a brand-new, replayable co-op mode that expands the story beyond the credits. In this IGN breakdown, we explain how Endgame works — from Operator slots and loadouts to Combat Rating, Skill Tracks, and extraction.

Learn how this large-scale, 32-player PvE mode mixes elements of Zombies, Multiplayer, and Campaign into one massive, progression-driven experience. Here’s everything you need to know before dropping back into Avalon.

00:00 – Intro
00:36 – What Is Endgame?
01:21 – Loadouts and Abilities
02:35 – Combat Rating and Skill Tracks
03:23 – Objectives and Exploration
04:04 – Exfil and Survival
04:40 – Rewards and Progression
05:09 – Why Play Endgame?

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 – Endgame Explained: How It Expands the Story and Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Play Horizon like never before in this brand new MMORPG developed by NCSOFT in collaboration with Guerilla Games! 

Explore the Deadlands alongside thousands of your fellow Machine Hunters as you explore the world, scavenge for resources and team up to take down massive machines. Horizon Steel Frontiers can be played anywhere, thanks to NCSoft developing the title specifically for mobile devices, so you can drop into the Deadlands on the go! 

For more news on Horizon Steel Frontiers as it comes out, stick with IGN!

#IGN #HorizonSteelFrontiers #MMORPG
title: Horizon Steel Frontiers - Official Gameplay Developer Commentary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Charlie the Wonderdog trailer for this upcoming animated film starring Owen Wilson.

The film follows Charlie the Wonderdog (Wilson), a beloved family dog; after discovering his superpowers, he sets out to fulfill his destiny and protect the people he loves —only to learn that real heroism comes from courage, kindness, and believing in yourself.

Charlie the Wonderdog opens in theaters on January 16, 2026.
title: Charlie the Wonderdog - Official Trailer (2026) Owen Wilson

author: IGN
description:
ARC Raiders reviewed by Travis Northup on PC and Xbox Series X, also available on PlayStation 5.

ARC Raiders raises the bar for extraction shooters pretty much across the board, with an incredibly gripping progression grind, tense fights against NPCs and other players that make for memorable matches, and loot that feels completely worth all the work and stress it takes to obtain it. The fact that it manages to also run well and look amazing all the while is just downright impressive, even if a few bugs here and there lead to the rare rage quit. For years I’d been wondering when someone would take the awesome promise of this genre to the next level, and ARC Raiders is without question what I’ve been waiting for.

#IGN #Gaming #ARCRaiders
title: ARC Raiders Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Good Luck, Don't Die, Have Fun trailer for the upcoming action comedy film starring Sam Rockwell, Haley Lu Richardson, Michael Peña, Zazie Beetz, Asim Chandhry, Tom Taylor, and Juno Temple. Good Luck, Don't Die, Have Fun opens in theaters on February 13, 2026.

A man claiming to be from the future takes the patrons of an iconic Los Angeles diner hostage in search of unlikely recruits in a quest to save the world.

Good Luck, Don't Die, Have Fun is produced by Gore Verbinski, Robert Kulzer, Erwin Stoff, Oly Obst, and Denise Chamian. It is written by Matthew Robinson. Good Luck, Don't Die, Have Fun is directed by Gore Verbinski.
title: Good Luck, Don't Die, Have Fun - Official Trailer (2026) Sam Rockwell, Zazie Beetz, Michael Peña

author: IGN
description:
Check out the official trailer for Cricket 26, the official game of the Ashes. Take command of your favourite team in the all-new Management Career Mode. Experience cricket's biggest rivalry in the expanded Ashes Mode. Step up to a whole new level of control with enhanced batting mechanics. 

Cricket 26 will be released on November 20, 2025 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Cricket 26 - Official Trailer
